meanings.definition: An estimate or judgment that is too high.
meanings.sent1: Her overestimation of her abilities led to disappointment.
meanings.sent2: The overestimation of the project's cost caused delays.
meanings.sent3: His overestimation of his cooking skills resulted in a burnt dinner.
meanings.sent4: The overestimation of his popularity left him feeling isolated.
meanings.sent5: The overestimation of the distance made the hike seem endless.

meanings.sent1: The overestimation of the market demand was a costly mistake.
meanings.sent2: His constant overestimation of his speed led to many speeding tickets.
meanings.sent3: The overestimation of the time it would take to get ready made them late.
meanings.sent4: Her overestimation of her singing ability made the audience cringe.
meanings.sent5: The overestimation of the team's strength resulted in a humiliating defeat.
